Sentencas: The growing integration of renewable energy into the power system causes the electricity profile to differ from the power demand.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This results in a deficit of electricity at peak hours and excess electricity during off-peak hours.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Accordingly, the purpose of this research is to investigate the concept of peak shaving storing energy at a cheap cost in off-peak hours and using it at a high cost for peak hours.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The present study proposes a novel storage configuration for electricity generation by combining a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), compressed air energy storage (CAES), and a water desalination unit.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The objective is to deal with power failures and interruptions in power grids that have a high level of renewable resource penetration while reducing the emissions produced by CAES systems.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The suggested system also combines a gas turbine and a fuel cell to create electrical energy during discharge, increasing efficiency and lowering pollutants.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An economic, environmental, and thermodynamic analysis of the proposed system's performance is conducted.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The suggested system is then optimized using the gray wolf algorithm to determine the optimal way to balance thermodynamic performance with economic and environmental factors.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Lastly, it is determined that at the TOPSIS point, this system's exergy round trip efficiency is 71.03%, its total cost is 34.07 $/h, and its pollution rate is 0.184 kg/kWh.
Titulo: Comprehensive techno-economic assessment and tri-objective optimization of an innovative integration of compressed air energy storage system and solid oxide fuel cell
